root: ^You chose to finally become a philosopher in the flesh, you have dreamt of this day for so long - isn't that right Marshall.
^A weary sage who devotes his remaining years to guiding the young toward truth and the meaning of being.
^Once more, you have found solace in the grace of reason, in the sanctity of education, in the quiet order of moral law.
^Perhaps, at long last, you may begin again.
